name: Aim High Cream Highlighter Stick
about: What it is: A clean highlighter stick formulated with nourishing ingredients to leave skin glowing without unwanted glitter or accentuating texture...Highlighted Ingredients: - Green Tea Extract: Soothes and hydrates while reducing the appearance of redness and irritation..- Watermelon Seed Extract: Retains moisture levels for visibly radiant, healthier-looking skin..- Rosehip Oil: Antioxidant rich with vitamins A, C, and E to reduce the look of.dark spots and improve moisture level...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Let your inner glow shine with this highlighter stick that builds and blends seamlessly, leaving skin with an undeniable longwearing luminosity. This stick easily glides across the skin to leave behind a gorgeous shimmer that hydrates and awakens the complexion...Clean.Our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing effectiveness.
ingredients: -Green Tea Extract: Soothes and hydrates while reducing the appearance of redness and irritation..-Watermelon Seed Extract: Retains moisture levels for visibly radiant, healthier-looking skin..-Rosehip Oil: Antioxidant-rich with vitamins A, C, and E to reduce the look of.dark spots and improve moisture level...Isononyl Isononanoate, Polyisobutene, Diisostearyl Malate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Ceresin, Synthetic Wax, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Rosa Rubiginosa (Rosehip) Seed Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Fruit Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Trihydroxystearin, Tin Oxide, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glucomannan, Phenoxyethanol, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxide (Ci 77491)...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-For all over luminosity, apply directly to high points of the face. .-Blend using a brush, your fingertips, or a beauty sponge.  .-Wear alone, underneath makeup as a primer, or on top of makeup as a highlighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was expecting more, this isn’t giving much highlight or sparkle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is a beautiful product but packaging is very bad. I ordered 3 times & the tip was broken all 3 sticks. Pretty annoying to get a brand new product with tip broken

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It looked greasy on me and swiped some of my makeup off. The color was pretty but I didn’t like the product itself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m still excited to use this product even though its tip was broken off upon arrival and opening. If LYS could get their products to people undamaged they might have all 5 star reviews!! So far I have tried almost all of their products and I am in love!!  So

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a new product for me. I’ve seen the look and reviews from makeup artists, so I thought I’d give it a try because I like how it looked and wanted to try cream bronzers/highlighter for myself. I bought brave and fearless. Both came damaged I’fearless. I’m giving

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Arrived broken :( packaging was a complete mess. Glitter was all over

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product i use it everyday and it gives me a natural glow and shimmer its so pretty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If I could give zero stars for this product I would. The packaging is so bad that the product broke from the first use. Moreover, I did not like the quality of the product. It disappears in seconds. Do not waste your money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love LYS products for their creamy consistency and the colour payoff. The packaging is also on point (I like the triangular shape). However, the highlighter was disappointing for me as it has  glitter :((( glitter. I wanted a bit of

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the formula and I love the price point. I’ll be repurchasing again. But I’m pretty sure this will last years lol. It melts into my skin. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this highlight. It’s a must have for my makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so sad! I opened my little package expecting a pretty savvy highlighter but instead it was completely empty inside. Never had a problem with LYS before so I was pretty sad. Will have to return it today ):

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product through LYS Beauty in exchange for a review and I absolutely loved it!! I was given the shade Genuine. I have fair skin, blonde hair and blue eyes. This gives me the perfect shimmery bronzed look. Highly recommended

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product blends like butter, and gives the perfect shine. A little bit of it goes a long way! The packaging does make it a little tricky to get out but the product is sooo beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great highlighter! Definitely very very pigment so a little goes a long way, which is great. It blends in so easily I like to apply a bronzer first then go over with the highlighter. Great for the summer! Would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very disappointed, the product arrived broken. When I first tried this product in store I was very excited and decided to place the order online since it wasn’t available at the Sephora near me. The product itself is fine but it is definitely disappointing to know it arrived damaged.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Affordable, glowy on skin & butter smooth texture!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the concept of this highlighter stick. It goes on smooth and blends nicely. The shade I received was little darker for my skin. Would have been better if it’s a lighter one. All in all a good highlighter over and under makeup

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an ok highlighter. It’s not my favorite. It was melted when I received it and was very glittery.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a very soft cream, unfortunately mine arrived melted or either pushed into the top so that was disappointing. I received this product for free as a brand ambassador. It’s very subtle and slightly glittery. I definitely prefer a liquid highlighter over a cream highlighter

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received the shade Genuine from LYS as a brand ambassador. This product from LYS is not my favorite. The stick highlights ok, but It’s pretty glittery and I prefer the other highlighters in my collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Is this the type of highlighter, you can only see when the light hits you, it looks very natural and glowy. I like to ware with my every day make up routine because it’s very easy product to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is creamy and the product is easy to apply but once applied and blended into skin is like it disappears. It also has glitter so what you are left is with glitter in your face and not a highlight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product!! It blends like butter and has been my go to for the last couple of weeks. It gives the perfect shine, without overpowering your look, and it looks better than powder to me. The only issue I have is the packaging. Since it sticks up a little, you have to be extremely careful removing the lid.   is the  is the la

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Didn’t see much of a difference after using this product . Needs more pigment and sheen to give some dimension . Rather use liquid or powder highlighter…

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never got it 💀so it sucks horribly this app is horrible too the agents never solve the problem 🫸🏻

reviews.review_title: I wanted to like this, but…
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: …unfortunately, I don’t. I wanted a highlighter that I could not see the glitter - this is not it, at all. I like the consistency of the product, buy you can clearly see the glitter once it’s on your skin. Packaging is nice to apply but feels cheap.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This highlighter was sent to me by LYS and I’m so thankful! They sent over the wrong shade so unfortunately this is too dark for me but the formula is beautiful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Even though the description says it will leave your skin glowing without any unwanted glitter- it is very glittery, it’s nice and creamy but just too much glitter specks in it. The color is very pigmented, you just need a little bit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: SOOO creamy, melts right into the skin! LYS never everrrrr fails 🤩

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the product however the packaging is awful. Most of my product was in the cap. It had literally flipped. Upside down doesn’t appear to have melted. Just didn’t seem to stay flushed to the bottom. Had to send it back in.

reviews.review_title: One of my go to highlighter stick!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves such a nice glow. Very pigmented and I love this shade so much. LYS did not disappoint.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this cream highlight for natural looks. I used this formula with all creams and liquids, and it didn’t make my makeup patchy, or pick up any of by base makeup. The pigment was subtle, but very pretty! My only change would be more pigment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tested the highlighter for two weeks. Really creamy and rich color. Has a beautiful shine upon application and you can build it. Combines really good with the blush and bronzer.  I do wish it lasted longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The way this leave you skin looking juicy and wet. She is a must have she isn’t glitter but high shine and you only need a little bit i have been wearing her daily i did received as a gift but will be buying more shades

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: She is stunning!✨ Got the rose gold shade and it’s so pretty. Creamy, smooth and buildable to your preference. Perfect glow especially this summer! As always Lys packaging is so unique and pretty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is extremely pigmented and has a perfect creamy formula that just glides on to the skin! I recommend for anyone looking for a bronze glowy finish and has a dry skin type.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous highlighter. Can be soft or built to BOLD. The Genuine Rose Gold color is perfect! I adore LYS and all they represent. The packaging is stunning and the product does not disappoint ! Love love loves disappointed appointm

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the formula of this product,it’s so smooth and the color is really amazing,I love all of their products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So pretty and creamy!! Glides right on and blends so beautifully😍

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Lys has some of the best cream sticks! This highlighter is no different. It is smooth, creamy, and pigmented. The only reason I gave this specific shade (warm bronze) 4 stars is because excuse it is too dark for me. It blends out ok so it’s not too bad, but it is a shade i won’t just grab. I definitely need to get the lighter shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely gorgeous! It blends so nicely and lays well with my other makeup! A great highlight option

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love me some LYS & they never disappoint! This highlighter stick is so gorgeous & easy to use. If you’re a huge fan of the bronzer stick you will love their highlighter stick!! It has that same creamy some consistency & it glides so effortlessly! The glow is real!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a high impact highlighter that gives you the juiciest look. Your skin will look so beautifully glowy without accentuating any texture, which I love!!!  In my opinion, this product does have a bit of visible glitter and sparkle…nothing too too crazy but I do see it. I personally don’t mind it, I feel like the formula of this product looks beautiful on the cheeks, almost like wet healthy looking skin and it blends out so easily and seamless. LYS does it again with an amazing product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very pretty! It gives a beautiful glow that lasts all day and I absolutely love it. I love how pretty it is although I feel I should’ve gotten the lightest one. I’m very pale so I just use a tiny bit of this and it goes a long way. I definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This new highlight has a very nice and creamy formula, this shade Fearless is too dark for my complexion at the moment but I’m sure it will look great once I get more color, the formula is nice and very easy to blend on the skin, leaves a beautiful dewy look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The highlighters are absolutely gorgeous and they are perfect for the summer! They give a beautiful highlighted wet look at the skin with a little bit of shimmer. They are not tacky, they blend into the skin beautifully, and they work on top of makeup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like using this illuminating stick enriched with beneficial components. It effortlessly combines and adapts, resulting in a lasting luminosity. The stick smoothly moves across the skin, delivering a delightful sparkle that moisturizes and revitalizes my skin tone. I also really like the packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stick is easy to use and it effortlessly blends to give you a stunning glow. This shade compliments my skin tone very well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This highlighter stick is super creamy and easy to blend. She is blinding and glowy on the face! She gives subtle if you like but also buildable if you prefer. I am a highlighter girlie, so I want buildable for a blinding look!  You can use it by itself or over makeup. She is lightweight and gives my face a natural looking glow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The product will give you a great summer sun-kissed bronzed glow look. The product is slightly glittery but not overwhelming . The product lasted 8+ hours and did not lack even after setting with powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After playing around with this product, I found that I preferred how it looked when applied to my skin directly, without a foundation. When I wore this on top of a foundation and applied it directly to my cheek from the stick, I noticed some separating of this highlighter (to be fair I have this same issue with other cream formulas). I tried blending it out with my fingers to make it look better, but up close it looked patchy. (When I blend it out with no foundation on my cheek, the separation issue went away. This highlighter blended out beautifully even just with my fingers when applied to plain skin. I loved that you could make it subtle for a shimmery look, or apply it thicker so that it reflected more metallic.) From far away, I don’t think you could tell the products weren’t cooperating with one another on my cheek. I only took one star off of my review because the product still worked other wise. It was still beautiful in my opinion. I absolutely adore the golden tone of this, and I feel like it can compliment multiple different skin tones. I also love the fact that this is so easy for on the go application! Since it’s in stick form, it takes up less room in your makeup or weekend bag too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lys know how to make great cream products! This new highlighter stick is simply stunning. You can go from a light glow to a blinding light depending on how much you use. It glides onto the skin so smoothing and looks so beautiful. A very easy to use products.

reviews.review_title: Wanted to love but too glittery
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After receiving the LYS Aim High Cream Highlighter Stick in the shade -Genuine -Rose Gold and wearing this highlighter for almost a month I am torn in my feelings about this product. I wanted to love this product but it' has so much glitter in it that it emphasized texture really intensely!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have the darker shade and I absolutely love it. Perfect for that summer glowy look. I use it regular as highlight or mix it with my bronzer/contour for the glow. Definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the shade genuine, It’s beautiful. The formula is very creamy and easy to blend out and it glistens beautifully on the skin without emphasizing texture. The stick makes it easy to apply too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This highlighter has a subtle golden highlight that pairs well with bronzer. The color payoff is definitely buildable depending on the look you are trying to achieve. The design on the triangular cream stick makes it easy to apply in many places besides the normal highlight areas. There seems to be a substantial amount of product for the price. Overall, a handy product for any age or skin type.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is super creamy and soft. I love how easy it is to blend. A little goes a long way. I can’t wait to try some of the other shades. I also like to add it to my eye look to add a little oomph to it. I would highly recommend getting your hands on these.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this!!  It adds a nice shine to my face that makes it look radiant!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Even though this highlighter is not the most ideal shade for my skin tone, it is still very beautiful!  It goes on very smooth, and its creaminess allows it r blend into the skin like a dream. It looks more natural on me, but would look more bold and vibrant on a deeper skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This comes in the signature LYS triangle packaging. The formula is super creamy and soft, so be careful of breakage. The color I tried, Fearless (Warm Bronze) is super pigmented and sparkly, definitely more suited to glam looks and darker skin tones, but you can blend it out or build it up so it's very versatile

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely gorgeous color and leaves so much shimmer! You definitely get a bold look and a little goes a long ways! Great addition to your collection! This stick will definitely last a long time with how much is in it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This highlighter stick is so beautiful on my skin tone. It's creamy and as usual I love that LYS infuses all of their products with skincare goodness. 🥰

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This highlighter is absolutely stunning! The pigmentation is incredible, and as someone with a medium tan complexion, it leaves me looking radiant and glowing. I'm excited to experiment and see what other looks I can create with this gorgeous shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVEE this highlighter stick!! The shine it gives and how creamy it is omgg! It’s so versatile and it never picks up any makeup underneath. If you’re looking for a creamy highlighter stick that’s pretty affordable, I highly recommend this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i ADORE this highlighter stick! The shine this leaves is UNREAL 🤩🤩 Not too much but also such a nice shimmer that honestly could be used all over. Love the packaging as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this highlighter so much! Fearless (shade) is beyond gorgeous and works so well for my skin tone!I love how creamy it is and how easy it is to blend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: omg i am obsessed with this!! it’s so creamy and blends so nicely making it look like i have an effortless glow!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First I’ll say that I love how creamy and smooth this formula is, it glides on so nicely. I received shade Genuine which is gorgeous. But I absolutely do not like this as a highlighter. It’s super pigmented, so very dark as a highlighter if you have lighter skin. This stuff is also super glittery! Like big chunks of glitter everywhere glittery. Which is not what I look for in a highlighter, personally. I do not like wearing straight up glitter all over my face. This is something I would use more like a cream shadow, so I think that’s how I’ll repurpose this. But I absolutely won’t be using this as a highlighter for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love lys beauty and this product didn’t disappoint it’s very creamy and the glow is beautiful. It looks very natural and glowy it looks beautiful under makeup as well. I love the applicator it makes it super easy to apply.  It blends or very nice

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in shade Genuine which is a beautiful Rose Gold shade. I love how easily it blends and how buildable it is. It gives a beautiful, lit from within glow, perfect for both makeup and no-makeup days. My only issue was that it came a bit broken. The tip was chipped and stuck in the cap. It is ok since i am gonna be using it but if you are purchasing it as a gift, you might wanna buy in person at a store. Other than that, the formula itself and packaging is classic LYS style good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This shade is so beautiful for medium to medium deep skin tones. It’s a warm bronze shade that gives a very natural glow. The texture is just like the bronzing sticks, very creamy and easy to blend. Pick this up! 😍🫶🏽 the pic is a screenshot from a video that I will be posting on 6/8 for the launch! If you want to check that out my TikTok is kkimberlymua

reviews.review_title: Full of glitter and melted during shipping
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this product from LYS in exchange for a review. I have a few complaints about this highlighter stick. The first is the way it arrived. I can only presume that it melted in transit, so when I opened the component, the entirety of the product came out of the base and was lodged in the cap. I could not get it out, so after closing and opening it a few times, it made a giant mess. When I contacted LYS, their response was that it’s not their responsibility how the mail carrier handles the product during shipment and they did not offer to send me a replacement.  This is poor customer service and I can only hope they treat paying customers better. I would recommend ordering this from Sephora where you can return it if it comes melted as opposed to directly from LYS. My other complaint is the product itself is a glitter bomb. It’s full of big sparkles that are very obvious on the cheek. Maybe some people like that, but to me this is a very bad formula and looks like straight up glitter. Do not recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This such a gorgeous highlight I love the way it blends and how it highlights my cheekbones and my top of my nose! I like the shade it goes perfectly with my skin tone in medium light! The formula is exceptional, it’s my new favorite highlight!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cream highlighter stick, the shade that was gifted to me was ‘Brave’ it is going to be a summer must all season! It’s so pigmented. I love it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have the color Genuine and it’s the most gorgeous rose gold highlighter - perfect for my light to medium Asian complexion. It was super emollient and easy to blend. I wore it on the high points of my cheeks,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product! I used it as a cream bronzer. It’s a nice creamy formula and blends out so perfectly. It was a little orange on me, but it was really pigmented which was great! And it made my face glowy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely in love with this highlighter. It is very creamy and has micro glitter particles. The glitter gives a nice highlight to facial skin. It glides easily on skin, remains on skin for a long time and creates a good definition highlight. The package is fancy in triangle shape which gives easy hold and control over product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a super creamy, buttery stick that gives extreme glow and some sparkle. Genuine is a warm rose gold shade. I was gifted this color by the brand to try and I highly recommend it if you love an intense highlight with a little fine sparkle. It can be blended out for a slightly less dramatic highlight. In this pic, I’m wearing Aim High over the Lys cream blush stick, applied with a small brush. Since the description doesn’t specify the amount, this item is .21 oz, the same amount as the cream blush sticks. These an be a little fragile in shipping, mine arrived (from the brand directly, not Sephora) slightly damaged inside the tube without a lot of packing paper, but the product is just as gorgeous and slid right back into place. The packaging is the same size and shape as the bronzer stick and the cream blush stick, but this one is a shiny gold plastic exterior. Can’t wait to wear this more this summer, it’s stunning! At $20, I think these are a great value and I will likely purchase another shade once I have a chance to swatch in store. I’m leaving my honest review as a Sephora Community Ambassador.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely gorgeous color! Especially for summer! Has a lot of shimmer and glitter to it and I like that in a highlighter for the summertime. Do yourself a favor and get you one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lys Beauty Aim High Highlighter Stick in Brave (champagne) is amazing! The formula and texture glide on so flawlessly. The pigment is beautiful and it is totally buildable depending on your choice. I am in love and buying all the colors. Lys Beauty is such a great brand! 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What I love most about this product is its simplicity and effectiveness. It glides on so smoothly and blends effortlessly, giving my skin a natural, dewy glow that feels lightweight and non-greasy. The stick format is super convenient—I can just swipe it on my cheekbones, the bridge of my nose, and a bit on my brow bone, and I'm ready to go. It’s perfect for those mornings when I’m rushing but still want to look put-together for school runs or quick errands. Plus, it lasts throughout the day without needing touch-ups, which is a huge plus for any mom on the go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous cream highlighter that blends beautifully and has excellent pigment and glow. This brightens up the brow and cheekbones giving skin a nice dewy look. The shade in a warm bronze is perfect for summer and even used it to highlight my outer corner for for a bright eyed awake look from a tired night.

reviews.review_title: The New Highlighter Must have for your Kit!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so in love with this Highlighter Stick! It glides, hydrates and is good on bare skin and with your everyday makeup routine with NO patchiness. 10 out of 10!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite kind of highlighter - creamy, easy to blend, and no textured sparkles in sight! The swirl of colors in the stick gives it a beautiful nuanced glow, which I feel like separates it from other highlighters on the market. This shade is a little too dark for me, so I used it sparingly (and more like a bronzer), but the way I would catch my glow in the mirror throughout the day was amazing! Will definitely try the other shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this highlighter a lot! It is not super sparkly, and when it is blended on the skin it gives a very natural glow. I will have to test the staying power, but so far so good!

reviews.review_title: I love this new LYS product!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! I love the new Aim High Cream Highlighter. The finish is so pretty and easy to apply. I’ve used the pressed versions, but I think this version is an even better. LYS always gets it right!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This will be my go-to highlighter for the summer. So buttery soft that it melts onto your skin. And the color Fearless is perfect for summer. It’s a beautiful bronze color and gold when the light hits it. Perfect for a summer tan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It blends out so nicely, and leaves the best shimmer ever. There formula is so creamy. I definitely recommend getting this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love highlighters and this one just became my new favorite! It goes on so smooth, blends out easily with fingers and gives a natural glow. Going to get the other colors asap!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the formula of this highlighter stick. Glides on ultra creamy & easy to blend! I received the shade Fearless (warm bronze) which is too dark for me to use as a highlighter but it’s going to look amazing as a luminous bronzer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The highlighter stick is so creamy and it blends like a dream. I love the packaging it comes in. It’s a nice metal like material and very sturdy. The shade rose gold is so blinding. I’m obsessed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Can you say pigment? Super creamy and blends so seamlessly into the skin. It gives blinding. It gives glowy. You can build this up for a more intense highlight. Or a subtle glow. I’m not a highlight girlie, but I’m obsessed with LYS beauty. And I knew this was going to be amazing! As it was! Very creamy and easy to blend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stick highlighter is so blinding and it doesn’t empathize my pores and I love that. I’ve even applied it to my body and it gives such a nice glow. I would definitely recommend picking this product up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Another 🔥🔥🔥 product from LYS Beauty! This hightlighter feels super cream to the touch! The pigment is glowing! You can use this alone or with makeup! The fact that works well over powder?! Winning! You need this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very creamy , blend like butter just like a blush and contour stick!  The sparkle is amazing and natural ! Also looks amazing under the setting powder , go give it a try !
